alert.note: Alert for Elmore (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 26 at 5:58PM CDT until March 26 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ELMORE AND NORTHWESTERN MACON COUNTIES... At 558 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Milstead, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Tuskegee around 610 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Uphapee Creek, Moton Field Municipal Airport, Yates Dam and Yates Reservoir. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southeastern and east central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
